name: Jet Boat Speed Racer Pro
description:
Jet Boat Speed Racer is the #1 critically-acclaimed and most popular 3D motorboat racing game. Jet Boat Speed Racer combines excellent visuals and sound with stunning gameplay.The game offers an exhilarating mix of wild stunts and intense challenges. As you race through hairpin turns at breakneck speeds on lakes and rivers, you’ll find yourself struggling to retain control. How fast can you go as a driver speedboat racer? Even more important, how fast can you go on a jet ski and have perfect handling control at the same time? This game gives you the opportunity to show that you are a talented driver speedboat racer and a hero in this fast and furious game race. In the beginning of this fast and furious game race we give you an awesome jet Boat to start your pro turbo boat racer career with. The more you win the bigger your jet boat collection is going to be. Playing this game will turn a rookie driver speedboat racer into a PRO driver speedboat racer. The only thing you need to do for this is sit back and enjoy the game.
Jetboat Speed Racer Features:

- Awesome 3D graphics in these water motorcycles games
- Sooth and realistic jet boat controls in these driver speedboat racer games
- User friendly interface in these boat simulator games
- These boat simulator games are suitable for both man and woman
- Two modes of gameplay, Speed Run and Ocean Surfer.

Game Modes:
- Speed Run
- Ocean Surfer

Speed Run:
Ride like a expert jetboat rider. Compete with 2 rival boats. Show your skills to win.

Ocean Surfer:
Surf as long as you can. Drive speed boat like an expert. Collect coins to unlock more boats. Get speed boosters to drive more fast. Avoid obstacles to drive as long as possible.

How to Play:
Control the speed boat by accelerometer, avoid obstacles, use speed boosters and collect coins.

For more suggestion/feedback feel free to contact us at gamesclanstudio@gmail.com
